document.masterDocTitle: Bees of the genus Colletes Latreille 1802 of the Asian part of Russia, with keys to species (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae)

bibRefCitation.author: Radoszkowski

Radoszkowski 1891
: 252
( type locality: “sur les bords de la riviere Sidémi (non loin de Vladivostok)”, Primorskiy Terr., Russia );

: 458

: 484

; Proshchalykin 2004 : 3 ; 2007 b: 879 ; 2010 : 509 .

Pérez 1903
: 224
–225 ( type locality: Mongolia ).
